context: I broke a promise to spend time together
letter:
Dear [Son’s Name],

I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for breaking my promise to spend time together. I know how much you were looking forward to it, and I feel terrible for letting you down. There’s no excuse for it, and I regret not being able to follow through. 

You mean the world to me, and the time we share is precious. I understand if you’re feeling hurt or disappointed, and I want you to know that your feelings are valid. Please know that I am committed to making this right and prioritizing our time together moving forward.

I hope you can forgive me, and we can plan something special soon. I promise to do better.

With all my love,  
[Your Name]
